project_info.name: SentiTrade-HMA
project_info.description: Temporal Fusion Transformer for Stock Price Prediction with Sentiment Analysis
project_info.author: Mohamed NAJID
project_info.institution: Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1 - Master 2 IA

key_findings: TFT Full Model achieves Sharpe Ratio of 5.17 (excellent for financial forecasting)
Sentiment contributes 5% improvement in MAE vs no-sentiment baseline
Walk-forward validation ensures no look-ahead bias
Transaction costs (10 bps) and slippage (5 bps) are realistically integrated
Win rate of 58.3% exceeds random baseline (50%)
Negative R² (-6.5) is common for volatile multi-day horizon predictions
limitations: 5-day prediction horizon may be too long for optimal accuracy
Sentiment from single source (FinBERT) - could benefit from multi-source
future_improvements: Integrate multi-source sentiment (Twitter, Reddit, analyst ratings)
Implement ensemble methods (3+ models with different seeds)
Add macro features (VIX, USD index, sector indices)
Test on longer time period (12+ months) and more tickers (20+)
